app.title: EssayCoach – Instant
home.hero_line: Scaffolds • Corrector (B2–C2) • Coach notes • Highlights & click-to-jump • Punctuation Rules • Guide & Example • PDF
tabs.punct_rules: Punctuation Rules? Part 2 (Letter/Email • Proposal • Report • Review)
guide.about: “Guide & Example” shows a full model answer for the selected Level + Task type. Toggle coach notes inside the modal.
hint.choose_level: Choose level and task to update the scaffold. You can copy or export to PDF.
hint.hover_highlight: Hover a highlight to see why it was flagged.
reminder.essay_counts: Essay reminders: B2 140–190 • C1 220–260 • C2 240–280. Paraphrase prompts, organise clearly, and maintain an academic/neutral–formal voice.
controls.use_ai: Use AI (ChatGPT) with exam-aligned style (requires Worker URL)
controls.show_coach_notes: Show coach notes & highlights for clause punctuation (B2↔C1)
preview.title: Preview with highlights (click a chip to jump; click a highlight to toggle)
preview.instructions: Paste your text and press Correct. We’ll highlight clause joins (FANBOYS / conjunctive adverbs) and show Coach notes on how to reach C1.
preview.changes_wait: Corrections will appear here after you click “Correct”.
actions.title: Actions
c2.quick_rubric_wait: Run a correction to see feedback.
vocab.alternatives_wait: After correction, suggested upgrades will appear here (especially for C1/C2).
